"A smart coat rack with built-in WiFi connectivity and an app that tracks the weather and suggests outfits based on the forecast, helping you stay stylish and organized."
"A coat rack that doubles as a charging station, with multiple USB ports and outlets to keep your devices powered up while you're on the go."
"A coat rack with a built-in mirror, so you can check your outfit and make any last-minute adjustments before heading out the door."
"A coat rack with a built-in speaker system, so you can play your favorite music while you're getting ready in the morning."
"A coat rack with a built-in vacuum cleaner, so you can easily clean up any dirt or debris on the floor while you're hanging up your coat."
